Summary: witnesses at traffic light see disc shaped object fly over
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness reports that he was stopped at a traffic light on the south side of Mountain City at 07:25 on his way to work. As he watched the light, he noted a metallic disc shaped object moving slowly westward under solid cloud cover . As he watched the object, a driver beside him rolled down his window and yelled at the reporting witness regarding the object. The witness then rolled down his window to answer the other witness and as they looked back the object had vanished. Details are contained in the primary reporting form for this sighting on CMS
trends: There has been one other sighting in Mountain City
There were no other sightings in Mountain City on or around
